summary: Defines a hierarchy of custom exception classes that model the various failure modes encountered when communicating with an ACME server, covering issues such as invalid or missing nonces, client/network problems, protocol conflicts, schema violations, polling timeouts, issuance failures, and unsupported wildcard requests.
business_intent: Enable precise error handling for an ACME client library so that applications can distinguish and respond appropriately to specific protocol and operational problems during certificate management.
